Articles.Content:
So, my cousin and her family came here for New year's Eve. (happy new year btw!) I showed her KSP and she got it kinda well! (Only the controls, of course).

The challenge is simple: teach a family member (father, mother, cousin, uncle, aunt or a grandparent) how to fly, orbit and land on the Mün!

Rules:

-Mods allowed. All except Mechjeb. 

-Stock rockets like the Kerbal X are allowed

-It isn't necessary for the rocket to be built by them: you can build it too!

-You might help them at certain moments, only by telling them what to do.

-By using the Dang It! mod, you are making it more fun!

-Do it ONLY WHEN THEY WANT. Dont do it if they don't want to. Dont abuse them to do the challenge

Bonus:

-You taught them how to build and use a fully reusable SSTO? Congrats!

-They built a reusable first stage and landed it back on Kerbin? Congrats!

-Fully reusable rocket? Congrats!

-Doing my No orbit to the Mün challenge? Congrats!

-Landing on the Mün more than once in a single flight? Congrats! (Strattenblitz75?)

-Minmus? Congrats!

Have fun!

Edited January 2, 2022 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
Yep, taught my lil bro. TWE (that was easy.)
